detail_desc: Slim-fit jeans in different colours of superstretch denim. Adjustable elasticated waist, zip fly and button, front and back pockets and narrow hems.
High-waisted, calf-length skirt in sequined mesh with a concealed button and zip at the back. Jersey underskirt.
Espadrilles in imitation suede with a frill trim at the front and braided jute trim around the soles. Cotton canvas linings and insoles and fluted rubber soles.
Short, sleeveless, straight-cut dress in softly draping satin with a small pleated stand-up collar that ties at the back of the neck, and a small opening at the back. Lined.
Short, fitted dress in cotton twill with narrow shoulder straps and a zip at the back. The cotton content of the dress is partly recycled.

Cargo trousers in a cotton weave with an elasticated drawstring waist and fake fly. Side pockets, flap leg pockets, fake back pockets with a flap, and legs that can be rolled up with a tab and press-stud.

Wide shirt in sturdy, organic cotton denim with a collar, press-studs down the front and a yoke with a pleat at the back. Flap chest pockets with a press-stud, long sleeves with buttoned cuffs, and a gently rounded hem.
Straight-style top in soft slub jersey made from organic cotton. Round neckline with a narrow ribbed trim, and flutter sleeves.
5-pocket skirt in washed, stretch cotton denim with a zip fly, slit at the front and raw-edge hem.
Fully lined bikini bottoms with a mid waist, medium coverage at the back and laser-cut, scalloped edges.
2-piece set with a longer sweatshirt and matching leggings in a cotton blend. Printed sweatshirt with long sleeves and ribbed cuffs. Patterned leggings in jersey with an elasticated waist.
Short-sleeved polo shirt in stretch cotton jersey with a collar and button placket. Slim fit.
Ankle-length dungarees in washed denim with hard-worn details. Adjustable straps, a chest pocket, side pockets and back pockets. Buttons at the sides, a fake fly and tapered legs with raw-edge hems.

Set with a dress and pair of leggings in soft cotton. Dress with buttons down the front, long sleeves with narrow, buttoned cuffs, a gathered seam at the top and a flared skirt. Leggings in patterned jersey with covered elastication at the waist.
Shaping briefs in lace and sturdy microfibre with a high waist, laser-cut edges and a lined gusset. The briefs have a sculpting effect that holds in and shapes the waist.
Metal earrings in various designs, one pair with fabric tassels.
Top in a soft, fine-knit viscose blend with decorative buttons on the shoulders, short sleeves and ribbing around the neckline, sleeves and hem.
Baby Exclusive. Shirt in a denim-look organic cotton weave with buttons down the front, long sleeves with sewn-in turn-ups, and short slits in the sides.
Leggings in soft organic cotton jersey with wide, foldover ribbing at the waist.
Top in soft pile with a drawstring hood, zip at the top and kangaroo pocket. Long raglan sleeves with wide ribbing at the cuffs, and a drawstring at the hem. Slightly longer at the back.
Long-sleeved top in soft cotton jersey with a print motif on the front and narrow ribbing around the neckline.
Blouse in slub-weave viscose with a V-neck, buttons down the front and short puff sleeves with smocked trims.
Trousers in a lightweight viscose weave with an elasticated drawstring waist, side pockets, fake welt back pockets and tapered legs. Wide panel at the waist for best fit over the tummy.
Short, round-neck dress in crinkled, patterned jersey with a small opening and button at the back of the neck, short, frill-trimmed sleeves and a yoke with a frill trim at the front.
Vest top in ribbed jersey with decorative lace around the neckline and armholes.

Shorts in woven fabric with a high, pleated paper bag waist, detachable belt with a covered metal buckle and a fly with a concealed zip and hook-and-eye fasteners. Discreet pockets in the side seams and wide legs.
Fine-knit socks in a soft cotton blend.
Jumper in a soft knit with visible seams at the front, dropped shoulders, long sleeves and ribbed roll edges at the cuffs and hem.
Baby Exclusive. Rib-knit socks in a soft organic cotton blend.
Make-up bag a zip at the top that continues down the short sides. Lined. Size approx. 7x11.5x18.5 cm.
5-pocket jeans in washed, stretch denim with hard-worn details. Looser fit with a regular waist, zip fly and button and tapered legs. The cotton content of the jeans is partly recycled.
Ankle-length cigarette trousers in a stretch weave with a regular waist, concealed zip in one side, fake back pocket and tapered legs with slits at the hems.

V-neck blouse in a soft viscose weave with inset lace trims at the shoulders and on the sleeves. Elasticated seam under the bust with detachable ties and 3/4-length sleeves with narrow elastication and a frill trim with an overlocked edge at the cuffs.

Straight-cut blouse in a cotton weave with broderie anglaise. Round neckline with an opening and button at the back of the neck, short puff sleeves with narrow elastication and a frill trim, and a scalloped lace trim at the hem.
Wide trousers in a sturdy weave with a sheen. High waist, zip fly, concealed hook-and-eye fastener and pleats at the front. Low crotch, side pockets, fake back pockets, and straight legs.
Top in soft, airy viscose jersey with long sleeves.
T-shirt in soft cotton jersey with appliqués.
Swim shorts in a printed weave with an elasticated drawstring waist, side pockets and a welt back pocket with a hook and loop fastener. Soft mesh inner shorts.
5-pocket shorts in washed, stretch denim with a regular waist, zip fly and button and raw-edge, cut-off hems.
Short, V-neck dress in a softly draping viscose weave with narrow shoulder straps and buttons down the front. Unlined.
Loose-fitting sports vest top in fast-drying jersey with a deep V-neck at the back with crossover straps.

Dress in a patterned viscose weave with an opening and button at the back of the neck. Short sleeves with sewn-in turn-ups, an elasticated seam and decorative bow at the waist, and side pockets. Unlined.

Padded jacket in cotton corduroy with a wide, pile-lined collar, and buttons down the front. Flap chest pockets with a button, welt side pockets, adjustable tabs at the sides and buttons at the cuffs. Quilted lining. Polyester filling.

Trainers in imitation leather with a lightly padded edge and tongue, elasticated lacing and a hook and loop tab at the front, and a loop at the back. Recycled polyester mesh linings and insoles and fluted rubber soles.

Shopper in grained imitation leather and imitation suede with matching clutch attached with a metal chain. Shopper with two shoulder straps with metal decorations and a tab with a carabiner hook on the inside to close the bag. Clutch with a zip at the top. Unlined. Size of shopper 14x32x40 cm, size of clutch 21x30 cm.
Ankle-length trousers in woven fabric. High waist with covered elastication and a frill trim at the back, a detachable belt with D-rings, diagonal side pockets and tapered legs.
Hair elastic decorated with a large bow.
Long-sleeved jacket in washed denim with a collar, buttons down the front, flap chest pockets with a button and welt side pockets. Adjustable tab and buttons at the sides, and buttoned cuffs.
Long-sleeved top in jersey crêpe with a V-neck, drawstring at the front and a seam and flounce at the hem.
Short, fitted top in ribbed cotton jersey with short sleeves.
Top in sweatshirt fabric with a print motif on the front, a lined, wrapover hood, long sleeves and ribbing at the cuffs and hem. Soft brushed inside.
Trousers in washed stretch cotton twill with a zip fly and button and front and back pockets. Slim fit with narrow hems.

Short shirt dress in a patterned viscose weave with a collar, concealed buttons down the front and a yoke at the back. Detachable tie belt at the waist, long sleeves with narrow, buttoned cuffs, and a gently rounded hem.
Slides in cotton canvas with a large bow at the front, imitation leather insoles and thermoplastic rubber (TPR) soles.
Court shoes with pointed toes. Fabric linings and imitation leather insoles. Heel 6 cm.
Calf-length dress in crinkled jersey with narrow, adjustable shoulder straps, a frill-trimmed, smocked bodice and softly draping, flared skirt. Unlined.
Jersey cap in a cotton blend with an inner terry sweatband and an adjustable plastic fastener at the back.

Set with a hat, pair of mittens and tube scarf in a soft knit. Jersey-lined hat with a pompom on top, earflaps and ties underneath. Jersey-lined mittens (size 2-6M without thumbs) with foldover ribbing at the cuffs.
Key lanyard in fabric with a plastic fastener, carabiner hook and whistle.

Running trousers in fast-drying functional fabric designed to help keep you dry and cool while exercising. Elastication and a concealed drawstring at the waist, zipped, mesh-lined side pockets, tapered legs with a zip at the hems, and reflective details.
Fitted T-shirt in soft organic cotton jersey.
Leggings in washed, superstretch denim with an elasticated waist, fake fly, fake front pockets and real back pockets.
Biker ankle boots in imitation leather with decorative tabs and metal buckles at one side and a zip at the other. Fabric linings and insoles. Heel 3 cm.
Cardigan in rib-knit cotton with a shawl collar, buttons down the front, long sleeves and ribbing at the cuffs and hem.

Triangle bikini top with removable inserts and narrow adjustable shoulder straps that cross at the back. Wide elastic trim and two frills at the hem, and adjustable hook-and-eye fasteners at the back.
5-pocket shorts in washed denim with hard-worn details in a looser fit with a regular waist, button fly and sewn-in turn-ups at the hems.
Dress in woven fabric with a small opening and button at the back of the neck, 3/4-length sleeves with a flounced trim, and a flounce at the hem. Slightly longer at the back. Unlined.
Cigarette trousers in soft viscose jersey with an elasticated waist, side pockets and tapered legs.
5-pocket trousers in cotton corduroy with an adjustable elasticated waist and zip fly with a press-stud.
Long cardigan in a soft, fine knit with long sleeves and ribbing at the cuffs and hem. No buttons.
Long-sleeved dress in a patterned crêpe weave with a smocked stand-up collar, opening with small buttons at the back of the neck, and a rounded hem.

Boots in waterproof functional fabric with imitation leather details, a padded edge and a hook and loop fastening at the front. Lightly padded tongue that can easily be pulled forward to make it easier to put the boots on. Reflective details. Pile linings and insoles and chunky, patterned soles.
Gently flared, calf-length skirt in softly draping satin with a high waist and concealed zip in one side. Unlined.
Short-sleeved polo shirts in cotton piqué with a ribbed collar, button placket and short slits in the sides. Slightly longer at the back.
Top in soft faux shearling with a high collar, zip at the top, gently dropped shoulders and long sleeves. Rounded hem with short slits in the sides.
Joggers in soft organic cotton jersey with an elasticated, ribbed drawstring waist, side pockets and ribbed hems.
T-shirts in soft, printed cotton jersey.

prod_name: CTH my wireless soft lace bra
detail_desc: Soft, non-wired lace bra with a lightly padded front and shaped cups with ventilating mesh pockets for breast forms. Narrow, adjustable shoulder straps and a wide fastening at the back with seven different positions for best fit.
3/4-length sports tights in fast-drying functional fabric with flatlock seams and an elasticated waist.
